name: Blade Runner (1982 style)
description:
This is the first version of the model, with which, no doubt, I will continue to work further.

It is based on the footage of this great movie.

I was interested in color, atmosphere, crowd and style. No special requests are required.

The strength of the model is 0.8-1.

modelVersions.name: v2.2
modelVersions.description:
I have carefully selected the photos.

Close-ups of people have been removed from the model.

The learning algorithm has been slightly changed.
